name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Flash
name_original: The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Flash
description:
The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Flash is a RPG game developed by Nihon Falcom. It came out on 26-09-2013. It was published by NIHON FALCOM. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Flash on PlayStation 3.
